channel.title: SlideShows of the Day
channel.description: SlideShare feed for SlideShows of the Day

item.title: Paris Web - Javascript as a programming language
item.description: How to setup up a stable javascript continuous integration environment and why you need it. Through a real life example, the talk explains all the benefits of having a development process that brings real control over javascript codebase. A deep analysis of developer and webapps needs and of the tools that fit those requirements.
item.content:encoded: How to setup up a stable javascript continuous integration environment and why you need it. Through a real life example, the talk explains all the benefits of having a development process that brings real control over javascript codebase. A deep analysis of developer and webapps needs and of the tools that fit those requirements.
item.author: cedmax@slideshare.net(cedmax)

media:content.media:title: Paris Web - Javascript as a programming language

item.title: Drive your dba crazy in 3 easy steps
item.description: It’s there, it’s always been there. And you know that if you want to do Domain Driven Design seriously, you’ll have to challenge some of the assumptions that have been around for so much time that everybody forgot we were able to deliver working software also without them. Of course, not everybody’s going to like it. Oh well ...that’s life!
item.content:encoded: It’s there, it’s always been there. Of course, not everybody’s going to like it. Oh well ...that’s life!

item.title: The Power of Infographics
item.description: People consume information on the web differently than traditional media. In an era of information overload we’ve become “grazers” of content, skimming digital channels for nuggets of information. More than ever, it’s important for individuals and organizations to be able to present ideas in a manner that can be quickly consumed, understood and remembered. The Power of Infographics is a presentation that digs into visual thinking, how organizations can learn to present their ideas visually and how infographics can be used to help achieve some common business objectives.
item.content:encoded: People consume information on the web differently than traditional media. In an era of information overload we’ve become “grazers” of content, skimming digital channels for nuggets of information. The Power of Infographics is a presentation that digs into visual thinking, how organizations can learn to present their ideas visually and how infographics can be used to help achieve some common business objectives.

item.title: The Art of Disciplined Creativity
item.description: Ideas and practices for regularly gathering sources of inspiration, eliminating blocks to more easily access creative states, prolong them, and leverage their power to develop and execute great work.

item.title: For a Future-Friendly Web
item.description: For full breakdown, visit http://bradfrostweb.com/blog/web/for-a-future-friendly-web/ This talk was from Web Design Day (http://webdesignday.com) in beautiful Pittsburgh, PA. This talk introduces the need to start thinking and acting in a more future-friendly (http://futurefriend.ly) way when approaching web design. The diversity of web-enabled devices is increasing at an alarming rate. We have to rethink our content and the contexts in which our content is viewed.
item.content:encoded: For full breakdown, visit http://bradfrostweb.com/blog/web/for-a-future-friendly-web/ This talk was from Web Design Day (http://webdesignday.com) in beautiful Pittsburgh, PA. item.title: Speak Your Mind
item.description: You have something to say Making yourself heard is a necessary component to success. But where, to who, and how you will say it may elude you. If only someone could give you a few pointers.
